result.arabic_text: وَرُسُلٗا قَدۡ قَصَصۡنَٰهُمۡ عَلَيۡكَ مِن قَبۡلُ وَرُسُلٗا لَّمۡ نَقۡصُصۡهُمۡ عَلَيۡكَۚ وَكَلَّمَ ٱللَّهُ مُوسَىٰ تَكۡلِيمٗا
result.translation: Twaranarungitse n’Intumwa Twamaze kukudondagurira ido n’ido amazina yazo, n’izindi Tutakudondaguriye ku mvo Tuzi. Imana Allah Yaranavuganye ukuri kwamye n’Intumwa Musa[27].
result.footnotes: [27] Iyi Aayah, irerekana ko Imana Allah Ivuga mu buryo bukwiranye n’icubahiro cayo, kandi ko Yavuganye n’Intumwa Musa ata muhuza aciye hagati.
